December 13, 2024 - Casual wear currently commercialized under the brand include footwear (mainly sneakers) and clothing (t-shirts, hoodies, caps). British Knights was launched in 1983 as a casual shoe brand. In 1985, they introduced their first sneaker collection, and sales exploded.
